GAMEPLAY_BulletsBoxDescription.English: A box of 50 bullets for reloading ammunition.
GAMEPLAY_BulletsBoxDescription.Polish: Pudełko z 50 łuskami do napełniania amunicji
GAMEPLAY_BulletsBoxDescription.French (France): Une boîte de 50 balles pour le rechargement des munitions.
GAMEPLAY_BulletsBoxDescription.Italian: Una scatola di 50 proiettili per ricaricare le munizioni.

GAMEPLAY_RevolverReloadingBoxDescription.English: A box of 40 bullets and shell casings for reloading revolver ammunition.
GAMEPLAY_RevolverReloadingBoxDescription.Polish: Pudełko z 40 łuskami i nabojami do przeładowywania amunicji rewolwerowej
GAMEPLAY_RevolverReloadingBoxDescription.French (France): Une boîte de 40 balles et douilles pour le rechargement des munitions de revolver.
GAMEPLAY_RevolverReloadingBoxDescription.Italian: Una scatola di 40 proiettili e bossoli per ricaricare le munizioni di un revolver.

GAMEPLAY_RifleReloadingBoxDescription.English: A box of 15 bullets and shell casings for reloading rifle ammunition.
GAMEPLAY_RifleReloadingBoxDescription.Polish: Pudełko z 15 łuskami i nabojami do przeładowywania amunicji do karabinu
GAMEPLAY_RifleReloadingBoxDescription.French (France): Une boîte de 15 balles et douilles pour le rechargement des munitions de fusil.
GAMEPLAY_RifleReloadingBoxDescription.Italian: Una scatola di 15 proiettili e bossoli per ricaricare le munizioni di un fucile.

GAMEPLAY_SmallGunpowderCan.French (France): Petite boîte de poudre à canon

GAMEPLAY_SmallGunpowderCanDescription.English: A small can for carrying gunpowder.
GAMEPLAY_SmallGunpowderCanDescription.Polish: Mała puszka do transportu prochu strzelniczego
GAMEPLAY_SmallGunpowderCanDescription.French (France): Une petite boite pour transporter de la poudre à canon.
GAMEPLAY_SmallGunpowderCanDescription.Italian: Una piccola lattina per trasportare la polvere da sparo.
